description: Detects a windows service to be stopped Author: Jakob Weinzettl, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Administrator shutting down the service due to upgrade or removal purposes
name: Stop Windows Service
query: ((process.executable:(*\\sc.exe OR *\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe) AND process.command_line:*stop*) AND (NOT (process.command_line:"sc\ \ stop\ KSCWebConsoleMessageQueue" AND user.name:(NT\ AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM* OR AUTORITE\ NT\\Sys*))))
